alert.note: Alert for Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 10:04AM MST until February 22 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting up to 35 mph at times creating areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...From this afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy and snowpacked roadways with blowing snow and periods of heavy snowfall impacting visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
